00013 #include "agg_basics.h"
00014 #include "agg_path_storage.h"
00015 
00016 class Rasterizer;
00017 
00018 typedef agg::path_storage   PathStorage;
00019 
00020 class vgPath
00021 {
00022     public:
00023         // A container to store vertices with their flags. 
00024         // A path consists of a number of contours separated with "move_to" 
00025         // commands. The path storage can keep and maintain more than one
00026         // path. 
00027         // To navigate to the beginning of a particular path, use rewind(path_id);
00028         // Where path_id is what start_new_path() returns. So, when you call
00029         // start_new_path() you need to store its return value somewhere else
00030         // to navigate to the path afterwards.
00031         //
00032         // See also: vertex_source concept
00033         PathStorage path;
00034         
00035         vgPath();   //throws bad_alloc
00036         ~vgPath();
00037         
00038         unsigned            getNumCoordinates() const { return path.total_vertices(); }
00040         void                clear() { path.free_all(); }
00042         unsigned            append(vgPath* srcPath);    //throws bad_alloc
00044         unsigned            transform(vgPath* srcPath, const VGMatrix& matrix); //throws bad_alloc
00045         
00046         void move_to(VGdouble x, VGdouble y) { path.move_to(x,y); }
00047         void move_rel(VGdouble dx, VGdouble dy) { path.move_rel(dx,dy); }
00048 
00049         void line_to(VGdouble x, VGdouble y) { path.line_to(x,y); }
00050         void line_rel(VGdouble dx, VGdouble dy) { path.line_rel(dx,dy); }
00051 
00052         void hline_to(VGdouble x) { path.hline_to(x); }
00053         void hline_rel(VGdouble dx) { path.hline_rel(dx); }
00054 
00055         void vline_to(VGdouble y) { path.vline_to(y); }
00056         void vline_rel(VGdouble dy) { path.vline_rel(dy); }
00057 
00058         void curve3(VGdouble x_ctrl, VGdouble y_ctrl, 
00059                     VGdouble x_to,   VGdouble y_to) { path.curve3(x_ctrl, y_ctrl, x_to, y_to) ; }
00060 
00061         void curve3_rel(VGdouble dx_ctrl, VGdouble dy_ctrl, 
00062                         VGdouble dx_to,   VGdouble dy_to) { path.curve3_rel(dx_ctrl, dy_ctrl, dx_to, dy_to) ; }
00063 
00064         void curve3(VGdouble x_to, VGdouble y_to) { path.curve3(x_to,y_to) ; }
00065 
00066         void curve3_rel(VGdouble dx_to, VGdouble dy_to) { path.curve3_rel(dx_to,dy_to); }
00067 
00068         void curve4(VGdouble x_ctrl1, VGdouble y_ctrl1, 
00069                     VGdouble x_ctrl2, VGdouble y_ctrl2, 
00070                     VGdouble x_to,    VGdouble y_to) { path.curve4(x_ctrl1, y_ctrl1, x_ctrl2, y_ctrl2, x_to, y_to); }
00071 
00072         void curve4_rel(VGdouble dx_ctrl1, VGdouble dy_ctrl1, 
00073                         VGdouble dx_ctrl2, VGdouble dy_ctrl2, 
00074                         VGdouble dx_to,    VGdouble dy_to) { path.curve4_rel(dx_ctrl1, dy_ctrl1, dx_ctrl2, dy_ctrl2, dx_to, dy_to); }
00075 
00076         void curve4(VGdouble x_ctrl2, VGdouble y_ctrl2, 
00077                     VGdouble x_to,    VGdouble y_to) { path.curve4(x_ctrl2, y_ctrl2, x_to, y_to); }
00078 
00079         void curve4_rel(VGdouble x_ctrl2, VGdouble y_ctrl2, 
00080                         VGdouble x_to,    VGdouble y_to) { path.curve4_rel(x_ctrl2, y_ctrl2, x_to, y_to); }
00081 
00082 
00083         void end_poly(unsigned flags = agg::path_flags_close) { path.end_poly(flags); }
00084         void close_polygon(unsigned flags = agg::path_flags_none) { path.close_polygon(flags); }
00085         
00086         // ------------- util ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00087         
00088         void line(VGdouble x0, VGdouble y0, VGdouble x1, VGdouble y1);
00089         void arc(VGdouble x,  VGdouble y, VGdouble rx, VGdouble ry, VGdouble start, VGdouble end, VGUArcType arcType, bool ccw);
00090         void ellipse(VGdouble x,  VGdouble y, VGdouble rx, VGdouble ry);
00091         void rectangle(VGdouble x,  VGdouble y, VGdouble w, VGdouble h);
00092         void roundRectangle(VGdouble x,  VGdouble y, VGdouble w, VGdouble h, VGdouble r);
00093         void polygon(VGPathDatatype dataType, const void* points, VGint count, VGboolean closed);
00094 };
